about_the_game:
developer note: I like monster girls. Why aren't there more 3D monster girl games?

Welcome to the Colosseum made possible by the first Demon Lord of Minami.

Demon's Regalia: Colosseum is a Turn-based Combat Fighting game were you can play as monster girls, monsters, and... Fight in the battle arena to earn gold and reputation amongst other fighters. Explore the colosseum and take part in various activities that may reward you with coin or something else truly fascinating. And Delve in the Dungeon that the colosseum sits at the entrance of, to hone and test your skills whilst discovering the old history of Minami and what makes it a thriving port city other than its fishing and trade.

Fight in the Colosseum

Engage in combat at the arena, with the selected character of choice and earn coin with every victory you attain. Monster girls ranging from the Hellcat of the southern continent, the Icedrake from the northern main Land, to the Gator and Slime girls which were once human adventurers, fallen in battle at the swamps bordering the city, now revived as a mix of monster and human. Fight one-on-one bouts to group battles of 3, deciding every action of your units with strategy and skill. Attacks including quick time like actions to really implement a lot of damage to your foes.

Explore the Colosseum

Peruse the lobby and stalls sprung about the arena, whenever it opens up... Once it opens, you may converse with the regulars and staff which may invite you to a pass time other than fighting or perhaps let you in with the on-goings of the colosseum. Mayhap there be a story a brew you may unravel with a mystery to unfold.

Delve into the Dungeon

Explore the Dungeon, sanctioned by the adventuring guild, and discover what lies within its walls. Maybe more monster girls? This is the most stable way that denizens of the city earn money and you too can take part in it. Just make sure not to fall in battle away from the jurisdiction of the guild or you will lose all of what you attained in the halls of this labyrinth.

You won't need Those where Your going

With intelligence comes integrity. Monsters do not need armor that is not their own thus their clothes will never break. Those with clothes on the other hand, let's just say their wear may not come back in one piece.

  • and more to come as the development continues...
